title: Update title version placeholder
description: Increment VERSION by 0.0.1 and replace  in the HTML title on page load using the script version.

title: Fix prompt logging and bump version
description: Ensure LLM prompts are logged even when errors occur and add a version constant, incremented by 0.0.1 for this bug fix.

title: Remove recent articles heading
description: Delete the list heading creation for 'Recent articles' from the article list section.

title: Avoid .env.js import 404 in hosted environments
description: Skip dynamic import of .env.js outside local/file contexts so hosted deployments do not log module 404 errors.

title: Add type query filter
description: Support ?type=topic|journal to prefilter interests selection; default to all when unset.

title: Add OpenAlex citation filtering + retrieval/summarization limits
description: Integrate OpenAlex cited_by_count fetching, add maxSummaryArticles and maxRetrievalArticles, support minCited filtering and sorting for summarization.

title: Log raw LLM output
description: Log the raw LLM output text before any processing in buildGptSummary.

title: Allow journal interests selection
description: Select random interests from the full list so journal-type entries can be chosen.

title: Justify summary text
description: Update CSS so .summary text is justified with minimal edits.

title: Use h3 for references title
description: Change bibliography HTML to render the References title as an h3 instead of a paragraph.

title: Add journal interests
description: Add the provided journal names as journal interests in interests.js without changing the entry format.

title: Remove article list rendering
description: Eliminate the ordered list of recent articles from the UI so no article list is rendered.

title: Remove unused class attributes in index.html
description: Strip class attributes from index.html when the class names are not defined in classless-1.1-mod.css.

title: Split interests into module
description: Move the interests array into interests.js and import it from script.js; load script.js as a module.

title: Reverse PubMed article order for OpenAlex filtering
description: When shouldUseOpenAlex is true, reverse the PubMed articles list so OpenAlex and summarization consider the oldest articles first.

title: Reconfirm OpenAlex citation filtering + summary/retrieval limits
description: Verify current implementation matches latest requirements for OpenAlex cited_by_count integration, maxSummaryArticles (default 10), maxRetrievalArticles (default 25), and minCited filtering/sorting.

title: Add query override param
description: Support ?query=... to bypass random interest selection and use the provided PubMed query instead.

title: Implement PubMed search + GPT summaries
description: In script.js, embed interests list, randomly pick 3 entries, fetch last 10 PubMed items per query (ESearch + EFetch) like prior_examples/index.html, then call OpenAI Responses API to generate summary HTML per topic/journal using prompt logic from prior_examples/pubmed_topic_rss_minimal.py. No rss.xml output.

title: Build classless UI + key storage + favicon
description: Create index.html and rendering layout styled like prior_examples/client_side_gpt_news (classless CSS). Use same URL param + localStorage pattern for the GPT API key. Use favicon.ico from prior_examples/client_side_gpt_news. Render summaries similar to prior_examples/rss2html_userscript.js with article lists and links.

title: Remove recent articles fallback text
description: Delete the fallback text 'Recent articles' from appendMissingPmids in script.js.

title: Remove inline styles from index.html
description: Delete the inline <style> block so only the classless-1.1-mod.css stylesheet is used.

title: Single-page PubMed interests dashboard
description: Build a single-page app with just index.html and script.js (interests.json embedded). On load, pick 3 random interests and fetch last 10 PubMed articles per query, then generate GPT summaries per topic/journal like prior_examples/pubmed_topic_rss_minimal.py and render like prior_examples/rss2html_userscript.js without creating rss.xml. Vanilla JS only. Use classless styling like prior_examples/client_side_gpt_news. Use same URL param + localStorage setup for GPT API key and reuse favicon.ico from prior_examples/client_side_gpt_news.

title: Add env.js loading for API key
description: Load OPENAI_API_KEY from .env.js via dynamic import with fallback to query/localStorage.

title: Verify journal search handling
description: Confirm script.js handles journal-type interests with journal-specific PubMed queries; update if missing.

title: Default to two topic selections
description: Select two random topic interests by default and update status text accordingly.

title: Select single random topic
description: Change selection logic to pick only one random interest of type topic instead of three mixed interests.

title: Adjust env.js handling and docs
description: Keep .env.js ignored, add .env.js.example, and update README to avoid embedding .env.js values while preserving dynamic import fallback.

title: Add JSDoc comments
description: Add JSDoc comments for functions in script.js.

title: Inject app version into title
description: Update index.html title to include  placeholder and replace it at runtime using APP_VERSION from script.js, bumping version by 0.0.1.

title: Revert to single topic selection
description: Set default selection back to one random topic interest and adjust status text.

title: Add README with query parameters
description: Create README.md documenting usage and all supported query parameters.

title: Add classless stylesheet link
description: Reference classless-1.1-mod.css from index.html and include the stylesheet file for the single-page app.

title: Adjust prompt and layout for summaries
description: Update the LLM prompt to forbid article lists outside References, move API key instructions to the bottom, remove the intro description line, and stop appending the 'Done.' status text.

title: Skip OpenAlex when minCited is zero
description: Avoid OpenAlex lookups entirely when minCited=0 to reduce network requests.

title: Deduplicate AGENTS.md
description: Remove duplicate or redundant instruction blocks in AGENTS.md while preserving required guidance.

title: Support days/maxArticles query params
description: Use URL or localStorage values for days and maxArticles query params, defaulting to config values when unset.

title: Add interest type to heading
description: Append the interest type to the h2 heading (e.g., 'Bioinformatics (journal)').

title: Remove topic badge and selected topic status
description: Remove the topic badge span in rendered cards and stop setting the status text to 'Selected topic: ...'.

title: Log LLM prompts
description: Log system and user prompts to the console before sending the OpenAI request.

title: Install Playwright and add page load test
description: Install Playwright and add a basic test that loads http://localhost:8000.
